title: I'll quit my job if I see these things!!
body: I saw these things and now I'll quit my job. There is no standby cleaner for the office, and I have to clean whatever gets dirty on my own, the door is cranky, and many more.

title: I won't quit my job if I see these things!!
body: I saw these things and now I won't quit my job. There is no standby cleaner for the office, and I have to clean whatever gets dirty on my own, the door is cranky, and many more.
description: Short description of the blog post.
